servinfo.title: Additional Heater Relay Inspection (Diesel Engine Model)

s1.ptxt: Remove additional heater relay No.1 (1), No.2 (2) and No.3 (3) from vehicle.
Check that there is no continuity between terminal “c” and “d”. If there is continuity, replace relay.
Connect battery positive (+) terminal to terminal “b” of relay and battery negative (–) terminal to terminal “a” of relay.
Check that there is continuity between terminal “c” and “d”.If there is no continuity, replace relay.
